Good files, Frank, say 2 simple words, sincerely, if you don't even know  
=
the lords prayer or any fancy prayer, all it takes are simple words like  
=
this,  "Our Father" help those asking for help, to get in line so they  can=
 get 
a second chance to live on the light, and be with loved ones  again."=
  
Those words should be enough, and The Boss Man will hear em  too!  sf
 
=
